comment:
>>37737062

"Stay calm! They go down in just a few hits! Just try to find an opening!" Nel's voice echoes from over your shoulder.

"One down!" Vision shouts; then, you hear him cry out in pain. You don't have time to look, as you're already on the move, eyes fixed on your target. A quick weave to the left as you draw within proximity, to dodge the first pincer, then the second. Quick on your feet.

There.

You raise your weapon, and dive in for a wide, sweeping slash.

> [[ 1d100 ]]
name: BSO
